Changelog
---------

Here you can see the full list of changes between each Flask-Test release.

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Fixed 'Popped wrong request context' handling


0.1.4 (14.10.2013)
^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

- Handled 'Popped wrong request context' error

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^

0.1 (30.1.2013)
